org.apache.juneau.marshall

Class StreamMarshall

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.marshall.Marshall
      • org.apache.juneau.marshall.StreamMarshall
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Jso, MsgPack

    public abstract class StreamMarshall
extends Marshall
    A subclass of Marshall for stream-based serializers and parsers.
    See Also:
